text: @ChrisCuomo @Scaramucci @NYGovCuomo Man, #cuomobrothers are bringing tears of emotion when it’s time for that. But here a lot of laughs to make things which lighter if possible. I am already a big fan of our @NYGovCuomo . But I loved this interview. @CNN #coronavirus
